modules.description: Creates and manipulates GPT-formatted disk images containing tar archives in designated partitions. Operates on raw disk image bytes and tar archive data, enabling extraction and inspection via standard tar tools. Supports partition layout definitions and data placement within the image structure.

Marshals a hybrid protective MBR and tar header followed by the GPT header into a buffer, using a specified sector size. Operates on Cstruct.t buffers and Gpt.t structures, ensuring proper alignment and size constraints. Used to prepare bootable disk images with GPT metadata for firmware compatibility.
